item.title: Your CFO Hates Me
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Your CFO hates my guts. Well, not me personally; weâ€™ve probably never met. But if he is anything like the CFOs at many of my client companies, he has reviewed the business case for a cloud migration and shot me a dirty look or two. When working with tech execs on their cloud migration strategies, I find their CFOs often get involved early in the decision making process. This is a good thing.
